name: 4 Day Inca Trail With Extra Night In Aguas Calientes
description: This is the classic 4 day / 3 night Inca Trail Trek with the bonus of spending an extra night in Aguas Calientes. This extra time will allow you to enjoy the hot springs in Aguas Calientes or a relaxing massage after a long trek. An exciting addition that this trek offers is the opportunity to visit Machu Picchu a second time! For an extra cost, you can return to Machu Picchu in the morning of the 5th day. If you choose this option, we can change the time of your returning train to Cusco.
